body_html:
@andrewharp thanks for the extra info. My end goal is to leverage this into my standalone app, but I was hoping to learn the connections and calls via the example. I think I might be confused on a few of the configuration options but I believe that I'm close. In regards to the copyNativeLibs section of build.gradle, should this be commented out?

task copyNativeLibs(type: Copy) {
from demoLibPath
from inferenceLibPath
into nativeOutDir
duplicatesStrategy = 'include'
dependsOn nativeBuildRule
fileMode 0644
}

When I leave it uncommented I receive the following error within Android Studio:

Error:(148, 0) Could not get unknown property 'inferenceLibPath' for task ':copyNativeLibs' of type org.gradle.api.tasks.Copy.Open File

If I do comment out the CopyNativeLibs block then I receive the following when attempting to run within Android Studio:

Error:Could not determine the dependencies of task ':assembleDebug'.

Task with path 'copyNativeLibs' not found in root project 'android'.

Thoughts?

Thanks again.

If I do comment out the CopyNativeLibs block then I receive the following when attempting to run within Android Studio:

Thanks again.
body: @andrewharp thanks for the extra info. My end goal is to leverage this into my standalone app, but I was hoping to learn the connections and calls via the example. I think I might be confused on a few of the configuration options but I believe that I'm close. In regards to the copyNativeLibs section of build.gradle, should this be commented out? task copyNativeLibs(type: Copy) { from demoLibPath from inferenceLibPath into nativeOutDir duplicatesStrategy = 'include' dependsOn nativeBuildRule fileMode 0644 } **When I leave it uncommented I receive the following error within Android Studio:** Error:(148, 0) Could not get unknown property 'inferenceLibPath' for task ':copyNativeLibs' of type org.gradle.api.tasks.Copy.Open File If I do comment out the CopyNativeLibs block then I receive the following when attempting to run within Android Studio: Error:Could not determine the dependencies of task ':assembleDebug'. > Task with path 'copyNativeLibs' not found in root project 'android'. Thoughts? Thanks again.
